article.title: U.S. Marine Corps Awards Contract to Cubic for Security Cooperation Education and Training Center Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Cubic Applications Incorporated has received a U.S. Marine Corps contract with a potential value of $31.7 million to continue training U.S. advisers to support the training of Iraqi and Afghan security forces. The security cooperation education and training center support contract is responsible for ensuring that security cooperation teams that deploy to various countries throughout the world receive customized predeployment training.
